name: MeWe Dark Theme (CSharpner)
description: A Dark theme for the MeWe social network.

user.name: csharpner
user.about:
I've been developing software my whole life.  Making themes is a new, side hobby of mine.  I prefer dark themes because they incur less strain on my eyes, drain less power from my mobile devices, and just plain look better (to me, anyway).

I accept donations via BitCoin:
bc1qdl3fflut4khf48umrrtxkmkug2vcvmmk3pd8n7

additional_info:
This is my first draft for the MeWe dark theme.  Most things on the main page should be dark.  I'll be actively adding more soon.

[Tax Day Update 2019-04-15]
Lightened up some links that were too dark against the dark background.
Editing your text comment still had a white background - fixed.

[Update 2019-04-08]
Darkened Search results bar on left.
Search panel for people
Search panel for groups
search panel for pages
search panel for chats

[Update 2019-04-07]
Updated colors in unread notifications to be more clear.

[Update 2019-04-06d]
Links in user profile page

[Update 2019-04-06c]

/*Tabs background in a group*/
/*Chat page*/
/*MY CHATS on left*/
/*Search entry*/
/*Groups page*/
/*OPEN GROUPS panel on right*/
/*PAGES page*/
/*Page header*/
/*Events page*/
/*Past tab*/
/*MeWe Store page*/
/*Your profile menu*/

[Update 2019-04-06]
Notifications seen & unseen are clearly colored as such.
Fixed white background on tabs on right when in a group.

[Update 2019-04-05]
Group info panel darkened.
Group chat popup darkened.
Post popup window fixed.

[Update 2019-03-30b]
A few more, random things darkened.

[Update 2019-03-30]
Darkened some menus.
Darkened some more elements on shared posts.
Darkened Notifications menu.
Background filter.
Comment popup.
Contact requests.

Just added the profile page.

[Update 2019-03-10]
- Contact request banner
- Profile drop-down menu
- Group invitation accept banner
- Footer of group header
- Group left panel
- "share the group link" panel
